answers.answer: Hi Everyone,I look forward to providing support and information for you all.I am diabetic for the past 5 years, and using insulin for the past 4 years - mainly due to my pregnancies.I am also hypothyroid, which is quite common in people with diabetes.Please feel free to post any questions you may have and I will do my best to answer you.Sally

question: Please join us in welcoming Super_sally888 as your new Diabetes Community Leader! She has a lot of experience and knowledge -- we look forward to working with both Super_sally888 and your entire community!!Best,CherylMH Community Mgr
title: Introducing Super_sally888 as your new Community Leader!
